named-native-query.name: Autor.buscar
named-native-query.query: select * from public.autor aut where (cast(?1 as varchar) is null or aut.codigo = to_number(cast(?1 as varchar), '999999999')) and (cast(?2 as varchar) is null or upper(aut.primeiro_nome) like upper('%' || cast(?2 as varchar) || '%')) and (cast(?3 as varchar) is null or upper(aut.inicial_meio_nome) = upper(cast(?3 as varchar))) and (cast(?4 as varchar) is null or upper(aut.ultimo_nome) like upper('%' || cast(?4 as varchar) || '%')) order by aut.primeiro_nome
